name: IPeak
short_description: IPeak is a peptide identification pipeline that is designed to combine a post-processing algorithm and multi-search strategy to enhance the sensitivity of peptide identifications without compromising accuracy. Currently, it can combine results from OMSSA, X!Tandem and MS-GF+. It can be used either in command line mode or in GUI (visualized) mode. The software package, source code, some example files and a user's manual file can be downloaded from here https://code.google.com/p/mzidentml-lib/. If you have any question about IPeak, please contact me: wenbo@genomics.cn
